Howard; Roy Thomas; Barry Smith | First = Conan the Barbarian #1 | Overview = The '''Vanir''' were one of the people of [[Nordheim]] during the [[Hyborian Age]]. Along with the [[Aesir (Nordheimr)|Aesir]], they formed the [[Nordheimr]]. They were typified by light skin, blue eyes and red hair.{{r|Savage Sword of Conan #12|; The Hyborian Age Chapter 3: The Hyborian Kingdoms}} They were considered a race of [[barbarians]].{{r|Savage Sword of Conan #12|; The Hyborian Age Chapter 3: The Hyborian Kingdoms}} | History = ===Origins=== The Vanir were probably descendants of the people of the [[Pre-Cataclysmic Age|pre-Cataclysmic]] [[Thule (Kingdom)|kingdom of Thule]],{{r|Savage Sword of Conan #40|; A Gazeteer of the Hyborian Age, Part VIII: Vanir's entry}} as were the [[Aesir (Nordheimr)|Aesir]].{{r|Savage Sword of Conan #14|; A Kull Glossary: [[Thule (Kingdom)|kingdom of Thule]]'s entry}} ===[[Hyborian Age]]=== 2,500 years after the [[Lesser Cataclysm]], the Nordics (Aesir and Vanir) drove all the remaining [[Hyborians|Hyborian tribes]] out of all the snow-countries, save for [[Hyperborea]]. Their land was known as [[Nordheim]],{{r|Savage Sword of Conan #12|; The Hyborian Age Chapter 3: The Hyborian Kingdoms}} the Vanir living in [[Vanaheim (Hyboria)|Vanaheim]], the western part of it.{{r|Handbook of the Conan Universe #1|; [[Vanaheim (Hyboria)|Vanaheim]]'s entry}} ====9,500 BC==== 500 years after the [[Age of Conan]], the north was the theater of constant bickering between the [[Cimmerians]], the [[Bossonians]], the [[Picts (Earth-616)|Picts]] and the Nordheimr.{{r|Savage Sword of Conan #15|; The Hyborian Age Chapter 4: The Beginning of the End}} Vanir adventurers came to [[Stygia (Hyboria)|Stygia]], where they overthrew the ruling class building a vast southern empire which they called [[Egypt]]. The early Pharaohs boasted to descend from them.{{r|Savage Sword of Conan #17|; The Hyborian Age Chapter 6: The Darkness... and the Dawn}} ===Legacy=== After the [[Post-Hyborian Cataclysm]], the northern{{r|Savage Sword of Conan #40|; A Gazeteer of the Hyborian Age, Part VIII: Vanir's entry}} Vanir, one of the variations among the [[Sons of Aryas]] (or [[Aryans]]), descended into the [[Danes]].{{r|Savage Sword of Conan #17|; The Hyborian Age Chapter 6: The Darkness... and the Dawn}} ==Culture== ===Society=== In peacetime, the Vanir pursued the regular activities of most other nations. They hunted and foraged for for food, and fished in the waters of the [[Western Ocean]]. While they had ships, they seldom ventured far from their own coasts.{{citation}} ===Religion=== The main deity of this culture was [[Ymir (Earth-616)|Ymir]].{{r|Handbook of the Conan Universe #1|; [[Vanaheim (Hyboria)|Vanaheim]]'s entry}} At least some of them despised the southern gods, deemed weak, in contrast to Ymir.
